## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `flutter analyze` and resolved all issues
- [ ] I have run `flutter format .` on my code

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the [CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md)
- [ ] I have updated relevant README sections if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested edge cases
- [ ] I have verified backward compatibility

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that no new dependencies are added unnecessarily
- [ ] If dependencies are added, I have justified them in this PR
- [ ] I have updated pubspec.yaml if dependencies changed
- [ ] I have run `flutter pub get` successfully

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have reviewed the security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have not exposed sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
